text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: ~ Thomas Edison

text: Your calm mind is the ultimate weapon against your challenges. So relax!
author: ~ Bryat Megill

text: Take rest, a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
author: ~ Ovid

text: Relax and take a deep breath. No one else knows what they’re doing either.
author: ~ Ricky Gervais

text: I’ve decided to be happy because it is good for my health.
author: ~ Voltaire

text: Success is a lousy teacher. it seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
author: ~ Bill Gates

text: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
author: ~ Bill Gates

text: Smart people focus on the right things.
author: Jensen Huang
